sources.title: Bride of the Monster (1955) Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson | Colorized Movie | Horror, Sci-Fi | Subtitles
sources.description:
A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.
Rumours abound about what may go on at a creepy mansion just out of town... The house is owned by Dr. Eric Vornoff who is conducting experiments to turn people into super-beings through the use of atomic power. Reporter Janet Lawton decides to look into what is going there and its possible connection to men that have disappeared in the area. When Vornoff takes her prisoner, he has definite plans for her.

Original title: Bride of the Monster AKA The Atomic Monster / Bride of the Atom 


Black and white version: https://youtu.be/M0sjBKTUSp8

Director: Edward D. Wood Jr.
Writers: Edward D. Wood Jr., Alex Gordon
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson, Tony McCoy, Loretta King
Genres: B Movie, Horror, Sci-Fi, Psychotronic film

00:00 Full length movie.
01:40 A group seeks shelter in a mysterious deserted house during a storm, encountering a mad scientist experimenting on humans.
07:05 Guest of Dr Eric Vornnoff.
12:25 Discussion on disappearances at Lake Marsh leads to debate over existence of monsters.
20:45 Investigation into mysterious disappearances linked to Loch Ness monster theory.
22:06 Mysterious events unfold in a swamp as characters search for missing individuals.
38:55 A scientist named Vornoff conducts controversial experiments in atomic energy, creating super beings against societal norms.
00:39:12 Strowski & Vornoff.
41:45 A scientist plans to create a race of supermen to conquer the world, using human experimentation.
49:29 A ravishing bride.
53:29 A scientist conducts dangerous experiments, leading to chaos and destruction in a horror sci-fi movie.

@CultCinemaClassics
